main event: A sighting of a round, bright object described as the size of a baseball was reported over U. S. Airbase, Lynch, L. I., New York, on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was bright lilac in color and emitted a brilliant white flash with a trailing white tail., The flash illuminated the cockpit of the observing aircraft., The observation lasted for about 2 minutes., There were multiple possible identifications, including balloon, aircraft, and astronomical object., The description resembles that of a meteor.
sighted object: round object, size of a baseball, color like lilac
location: Lynch, L. I., New York, USA
